title: Lord of the Rings Esolang
caption: Interpreted Language
description: Developed an esoteric programming language in TypeScript, including a lexer, AST, parser, and evaluator, inspired by a Lord of the Rings phase during winter 2024.

This project enhanced my understanding of language design and compiler construction while gaining hands-on experience with TypeScript's type system. I implemented a lexer for tokenization, an abstract syntax tree (AST) for structure, and a parser and evaluator to interpret and execute code.
seoDescription: Lord of the Rings Esolang is an esoteric language interpreter built with TypeScript and Deno. It supports a REPL mode and transcribes '.lotr' files into executable code.
